entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.7Â°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:31 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
